📚 API Reference

Complete reference for all 17 Odù domains + 7 stacks

Core Domains (16 Odù)

Ogbe 1111

System/Lifecycle

type, iru, len, gigun, assert, jẹri, format, ṣẹda, parse_int, parse_float

Oyeku 0000

Exit/Sleep

jade, exit, sun, sleep, sun_sẹkọndi, sleep_sec

Iwori 0110

Time/Iteration

bayi, now, timestamp, bayi_ms, now_ms, aago, elapsed, ṣe_ọjọ, format, iso, ka_ọjọ, parse, laarin, range

Odi 1001

Files/Database

ka, read, kọ, write, fikun, append, wa, exists, pa, delete, remove, ṣe_akojọ, list, ls, ṣe_folda, mkdir

Irosu 1100

Console I/O

fo, sọ, print, println, ka, input, listen, gbo, kigbe, error

Owonrin 0011

Random

nọmba, random, rand, laarin, range, ida, float, boolean, bool, aruwo, shuffle, yan, choice

Obara 1000

Math Add/Mul

fikun, add, isodipupo, mul, multiply, agbara, pow, power, abs, max, min

Okanran 0001

Errors

ta, throw, error, jagun, panic, jẹri, assert, jẹri_asọ, assert_msg, jẹri_bakan, assert_eq, jẹri_yato, assert_ne, ko_ṣee_de, unreachable

Ogunda 1110

Arrays/Lists

da, create, new, gigun, len, fikun, push, append, yọ, pop, yipada, reverse, akọkọ, first, ikẹhin, last, gba, get, ni, contains, ge, slice, maapu, map, ṣàjọ, filter

Osa 0111

Concurrency

awọn_okun, threads, num_threads, afikun_afiwe, parallel_sum, vector_sum, isoro_afiwe, parallel_product, vector_product, kekere_afiwe, parallel_min, tobi_afiwe, parallel_max, tọ_afiwe, parallel_sort, eyikeyi_afiwe, parallel_any, gbogbo_afiwe, parallel_all, sun, sleep, bẹrẹ, spawn, duro, await, fi, send, gba, recv

Ika 0100

Strings

so, concat, dapo, join, gigun, len, pin, split, trim, uppercase, upper, lowercase, lower, ni, contains, has, ropo, replace, sub, substring, slice

Oturupon 0010

Math Sub/Div

yọkuro, sub, subtract, pin, div, divide, iyoku, mod, modulo, floor_div, neg, negate, sqrt

Otura 1011

Networking

http_get, gba, get, http_post, fi, post, serve, sin, listen, ws_connect, asopọ_ws, fetch_json, gba_json, url_encode, koodu_url

Irete 1101

Crypto

sha256, fọwọsi, encode_base64, si_base64, decode_base64, lati_base64, random_bytes, awọn_baiti_laileto, uuid, id_alailẹgbẹ, hmac, ṣayẹwo, hash_password, fọwọsi_ọrọigbaniwọle, verify_password, rii_daju_ọrọigbaniwọle

Ose 1010

Terminal UI

nu, clear, lọ_si, goto, move_to, awọ, color, apoti, box, kọ_si, print_at, fia_kasọta, hide_cursor, ṣafihan_kasọta, show_cursor, iwọn, size

Ofun 0101

Permissions

ni_agbara, has_capability, can, beere, request, iru, typeof, awọn_ẹsẹ, methods, awọn_agbara, capabilities, alaye_ẹka, module_info

Advanced
